Text.valUnicode: Every XML document must have one Root record.
The Contacts element is the main repeating element. This would be the "header" record.
Phone numbers are the first repeating element within Contacts. Each contact can have zero or infinite phones.
Addresses repeat in the same way Phones do.
Fill the XML file with data from the SQL Address Book.
Displays the raw XML internal data.

ExpSyntax.val: 'XM05: How Do I Access a Certain Compound in an XML File?'
